name: Forresto
description:
THE BIRDS ARE EVIL AND YOU ARE HERE TO STOP THEM

They want to eat your planets! Take care of your forests (and HARVEST them!) to repel the vicious attackers and survive as long as you can.

How to play:

♠ Look around using WASD keys (press Shift to move quicker). Use mouse scroll to zoom.

♠ Hover your mouse over the planet's edge to see it's slots.

♠ Left click on the slot to open a tree selection panel.

♠ There are four type of trees you can plant on a planet:

  • Resource making tree tier 1 (It will grow quite quickly and the more it has grown the more money you will get by harvesting it)
  • Resource making tree tier 2 (It will grow slower than the tier one, but it will yield more money after being harvested)
  • Shooting tree tier 1 (Use it to defend against first waves, the more it grows, the faster it shoots, non-harvestable)
  • Shooting tree tier 2 (This is your main tree used to defend against evil birds, it shoots projectiles that don’t get destroyed when they hit an enemy, non-harvestable)

♠ Left click on the desired tree type to plant it on the selected slot.

♠ Right click to hide the panels if they overwhelm you.

♠ Left click on the tree to harvest it. Harvesting a tree gives you resources, and with resources you can build more trees.

♠ All planets have health points, and losing it is indicated by dimming the light of the planet. Once it’s light goes dark, the planet is consumed by the birds. When all of the planets are consumed, the evil birds win, and they fly happily knowing that you failed.
